verses.text: So \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* dine \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Esther \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w drank|strong="H4960"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w once|strong="H3117"\w* \w more|strong="H8145"\w*, “\w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w*? \w It|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*? \w Even|strong="H1571"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w*, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="H6213"\w*.”

\w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “If \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* if \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w pleases|strong="H2895"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w petition|strong="H7596"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H1246"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* out \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w destruction|strong="H8045"\w*, death, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* annihilation. \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* merely \w been|strong="H5971"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w menservants|strong="H5650"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w maidservants|strong="H8198"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w remained|strong="H2790"\w* \w silent|strong="H2790"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* no such \w distress|strong="H6862"\w* \w would|strong="H5971"\w* justify burdening \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Xerxes spoke \w up|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* asked \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w where|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* devise \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* scheme?”

Esther replied, “\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w adversary|strong="H6862"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6862"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w*—\w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*!” \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w stood|strong="H2001"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* terror \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w drinking|strong="H4960"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1055"\w* \w garden|strong="H1594"\w*, \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w stayed|strong="H5975"\w* \w behind|strong="H5975"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w beg|strong="H1245"\w* \w Queen|strong="H4436"\w* Esther \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w realized|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* planning \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w terrible|strong="H7451"\w* fate \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Just|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w garden|strong="H1594"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w hall|strong="H1004"\w*, \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w falling|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w couch|strong="H4296"\w* \w where|strong="H1004"\w* Esther \w was|strong="H1697"\w* reclining. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* exclaimed, “\w Would|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* actually \w assault|strong="H3533"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w queen|strong="H4436"\w* \w while|strong="H5973"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*?” \w As|strong="H1697"\w* soon \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w covered|strong="H2645"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*’s \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Harbonah|strong="H2726"\w*, \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* attending \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w said|strong="H1696"\w*: “\w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* cubits \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w built|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w gave|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w report|strong="H1696"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* saved \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.” “\w Hang|strong="H8518"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*!” \w declared|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*. \w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w subsided|strong="H7918"\w*.
